    E

    Effect - Interface in modelisation
    Represents an effect applied by a weapon or item during combat.
    Effect_Aoe - Class in modelisation
    An area-of-effect attack that damages every enemy in the combat.
    Effect_Aoe(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Aoe
     
    Effect_Atteck - Class in modelisation
    An attack effect.
    Effect_Atteck(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Atteck
     
    Effect_Backfire - Class in modelisation
    A risky effect that damages the enemy and also hurts the hero.
    Effect_Backfire(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Backfire
     
    Effect_Charge - Class in modelisation
    A mana-recovery effect.
    Effect_Charge(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Charge
     
    Effect_Def - Class in modelisation
    A defensive effect that increases the hero's block for the current turn.
    Effect_Def(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Def
     
    Effect_Heal - Class in modelisation
    A healing effect that restores health points to the hero.
    Effect_Heal(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Heal
     
    Effect_Lifesteal - Class in modelisation
    An attack effect that also heals the hero by the dealt amount.
    Effect_Lifesteal(int) - Constructor for class modelisation.Effect_Lifesteal
     
    Effect_Puncture - Class in modelisation
